languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off pain, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chance of resisting negative physical {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each point of a Toughness bonus, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} (ВЫН) определяет, насколько легко персонаж может оправиться от повреждений, а также способность действовать на зараженной местности и сопротивляться болезням, отравлению и другим факторам, влияющим на физическое состояние. Выносливость повышает шанс сопротивления физическим негативным {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектам{/g} и увеличивает значение {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа. Каждая бонусная единица Выносливости дает +10% к общему значению здоровья.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Toughness defines how easily the character can shrug off injury, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It affects the chances of resisting negative physical effects and the amount of character's wounds. For each Toughness bonus point characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the Carouse skill.

Toughness (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off injuries, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chances of resisting negative physical effects and the amount of a character's wounds. For each bonus point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the Carouse skill.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off pain, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chance of resisting negative physical {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each point of a Toughness bonus, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}代表角色克服伤势的难易程度，以及抵抗毒素、有毒环境、疾病与其他身体症状的能力。提高坚韧可以提高抵抗负面物理效果的几率，提高角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。每有1点坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的生命值就会提高10%。
此外，坚韧还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}技能。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off pain, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chances of resisting negative physical effects and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}代表角色克服{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}的难易程度，以及抵抗毒素、有毒环境、疾病与其他身体症状的能力。提高坚韧可以提高抵抗负面物理效果的几率，提高角色的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。每有1点坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的生命值就会提高10%。
此外，坚韧还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} (RES) define la facilidad con la que un personaje resiste las lesiones, así como las toxinas, los entornos tóxicos, las enfermedades y otras dolencias físicas. Aumenta la probabilidad de resistir {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} negativos físicos y la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un personaje. Por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Resistencia, el personaje gana un +10 % de heridas.
También afecta a la habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off pain, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chances of resisting negative physical effects and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} (RES) define la facilidad con la que un personaje resiste las {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}, así como las toxinas, los entornos tóxicos, las enfermedades y otras dolencias físicas. Aumenta la probabilidad de resistir efectos negativos físicos y la cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un personaje. Por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Resistencia, el personaje gana un +10 % de heridas.
También afecta a la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}体力{/g}はキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}から立ち直る早さのほか、毒物、毒環境、病気、その他の物理的な不調にどの程度抵抗できるかを示す。この値が高いほど物理的なマイナス効果に抵抗する確率と、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が増加する。体力の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ポイント1つにつき、キャラクターの傷が+10%増加する。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}スキルにも影響する。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chances of resisting negative physical effects and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} skill.

また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}にも影響する。

Выносливость повышает шанс сопротивления физическим негативным эффектам и увеличивает значение {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа. Каждая {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусная{/g} единица Выносливости дает +10% к общему значению здоровья.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} (ВЫН) определяет, насколько легко персонаж может оправиться от повреждений, а также способность действовать на зараженной местности и сопротивляться болезням, отравлению и другим факторам, влияющим на физическое состояние. Выносливость повышает шанс сопротивления физическим негативным эффектам и увеличивает значение {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа. Каждая {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусная{/g} единица Выносливости дает +10% к общему значению здоровья.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} (ZÄH) bestimmt, wie leicht ein Charakter Schmerzen abschüttelt und wie leicht er Giften, giftigen Umgebungen, Krankheiten und anderen körperlichen Beschwerden widerstehen kann. Sie erhöht die Chance, negativen physischen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekten{/g} zu widerstehen, und die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Charakters. Für jeden Bonus-Punkt Zähigkeit erhalten Charaktere +10 % Wunden.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off pain, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chances of resisting negative physical {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each bonus point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} (ZÄH) bestimmt, wie leicht ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} abschüttelt und wie leicht er Giften, giftigen Umgebungen, Krankheiten und anderen körperlichen Beschwerden widerstehen kann. Sie erhöht die Chance, negativen physischen Effekten zu widerstehen und die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Charakters. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonuspunkt{/g} Zähigkeit erhalten Charaktere +10 % Wunden.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g}.

languages.text:
L'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} (E) définit la facilité avec laquelle un personnage peut supporter la douleur et résister aux toxines, aux environnements toxiques, aux maladies et autres affections physiques. Elle augmente les chances de résister aux effets physiques négatifs ainsi que le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la réserve d'un personnage. Pour chaque point {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'Endurance, les personnages bénéficient de +10 % de blessures.
La Résistance influe également sur la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH) defines how easily a character can shrug off pain, as well as how easily they can resist toxins, poisonous environments, diseases, and other physical ailments. It increases the chances of resisting negative physical effects and the amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} (RES) définit la facilité avec laquelle un personnage peut éviter les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessures{/g} et résister aux toxines, aux environnements toxiques, aux maladies et autres affections physiques. Elle augmente les chances de résister aux effets physiques négatifs ainsi que le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la réserve d'un personnage. Pour chaque point {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Résistance, les personnages bénéficient de +10 % de blessures.
La Résistance influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Ripaille{/g}.
